se.cbb.jprime.consensus.day

Class RobinsonFoulds

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.consensus.day.RobinsonFoulds

  • public class RobinsonFoulds
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses Day's algorithm to compute the Robinson-Foulds distance metric between two trees T_1 and T_2, i.e. "the number of partitions of data implied by T_1 but not T_2 + the number of partitions implied by T_2 but not T_1" in Wikipedia's phrasing.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

      • computeDistance

        public static int computeDistance(RootedTree tree1,
                  StringMap names1,
                  RootedTree tree2,
                  StringMap names2,
                  boolean treatAsUnrooted)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Computes the symmetric RF distance between two trees.
        Parameters:
        tree1 - the first tree.
        names1 - the leaf names of the first tree.
        tree2 - the second tree.
        names2 - the leaf names of the second tree.
        treatAsUnrooted - true to treat the trees as unrooted.
        Returns:
        the symmetric RF distance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if naming mismatch, etc.

      • computeAsymmetricDistance

        public static int computeAsymmetricDistance(TemplatedPSWTree compTree)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Computes the asymmetric (nota bene) RF distance between two trees.
        Parameters:
        compTree - the templated tree to be compared with its template.
        Returns:
        the number of partitions in the templated tree not in its template.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if tree mismatches, etc.
